div.p: This code system https://i-tech-uw.github.io/openelis-global2-fhir-ig/codesystem-service-request-status defines the following codes:

tr.td: The request is in force and ready to be acted upon.
The activity described by the request has been fully performed. No further activity will occur.
The request (and any implicit authorization to act) has been terminated prior to the known full completion of the intended actions. No further activity should occur.

definition.value: The request is in force and ready to be acted upon.
The activity described by the request has been fully performed. No further activity will occur.
The request (and any implicit authorization to act) has been terminated prior to the known full completion of the intended actions. No further activity should occur.
